member.name: IMFSourceBufferNotify.OnAbort
member.summary: Used to indicate that the source buffer has been aborted.

member.name: IMFSourceBufferNotify.OnError
member.summary: Used to indicate that an error has occurred with the source buffer.

member.name: IMFSourceBufferNotify.OnUpdate
member.summary: Used to indicate that the source buffer is updating.

member.name: IMFSourceBufferNotify.OnUpdateEnd
member.summary: Used to indicate that the source buffer has finished updating.

member.name: IMFSourceBufferNotify.OnUpdateStart
member.summary: Used to indicate that the source buffer has started updating.

member.name: IMFSourceBufferNotify
member.summary: Provides functionality for raising events associated with .
